segments.text: I feel a bit sad watching this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so alone, even though she's surrounded by her children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying dishes, completely absorbed in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's drowning in her chores, not even noticing the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, on the other hand, are so full of life, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on the stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their innocence and carefreeness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, so full of hope and expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman could see the joy and life in her children's eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of her daze and notices the beauty around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just makes me feel a bit melancholic, seeing the woman so disconnected from the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
